result.eng: I picked a book in the library.
result.html: phioc mé leabhar sa leabharlannI picked a book in the library.
result.ponchtml: ṗioc mé leaḃar sa leaḃarlannI picked a book in the library.

result.eng: The café is opposite the library.
result.ga: tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainne
result.orig: tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainne
result.html: tá an caifé ar aghaidh na leabharlainneThe café is opposite the library.
result.ponchtml: tá an caifé ar aġaiḋ na leaḃarlainneThe café is opposite the library.

result.ga: tá sé gar don leabharlann
result.orig: tá sé gar don leabharlann
result.html: tá sé gar don leabharlannIt is near the library.
result.ponchtml: tá sé gar don leaḃarlannIt is near the library.

result.eng: Can I get a library card?
result.ga: an féidir liom cárta leabharlainne a fháil
result.orig: an féidir liom cárta leabharlainne a fháil
result.html: an féidir liom cárta leabharlainne a fháilCan I get a library card?
result.ponchtml: an féidir liom cárta leaḃarlainne a ḟáilCan I get a library card?

result.eng: We are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
result.ga: bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den am
result.orig: bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den am
result.html: bíonn muid sa leabharlann agus sa saotharlann an chuid is mó den amWe are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
result.ponchtml: bíonn muid sa leaḃarlann agus sa saoṫarlann an ċuid is mó den amWe are [usually] in the library and the lab most of the time.
